name: Naruto Shippuden: Naruto VS. Sasuke
description:
Naruto Shippuden: Naruto VS. Sasuke is an action-platformer game developed by Aspect and Tomy. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by D3 Publisher. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Naruto Shippuden: Naruto VS. Sasuke is available on Nintendo DS.
